title: The Metropolitan Commissioner may allow the owner to develop the final plot in possession of the owner subject to handing over to the Planning Authorities share as independent plot free of cost as per norms prescribed by Metropolitan Commissioner
clause_text: The Metropolitan Commissioner may allow the owner to develop the final plot in possession of the owner subject to handing over to the Planning Authorities share as independent plot free of cost as per norms prescribed by Metropolitan Commissioner.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
